price: تاسې كه پټې خبرې كوئ يايې ښكاره کوئ، هغه آن د زړونو په رازونو خبر دى.
arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
